Name: Widgit InPrint 3
Description:
The Widgit In Print 3 is a software program for desktop publishing. The program can be used as a creating symbol-support resource for printing. It is an ideal tool used for users wanting to create accessible materials for their school home, community or business.

Features

  • The program is supplied with over 150 000 Widgit Symbols in Black, White and Colour that have been developed to support access to information.
  • Over 140 templates to edit and use.
  • Assists with making the materials completely accessible.
  • Allows for creating poster, books, leaflets, worksheets, flashcards and timetables.
  • Consist of a collection of templates and resources enables quick creations of what is required.
  • Provides great flexibility which allows you to insert, resize and remove rows, columns and merge cells.
  • Consist of table editing tools which allows for creating accurate sized tables and cells for complete control over the layout.
  • Allows for personalising of documents which includes drag and drop of photographs onto individual words to personalise their meaning.
  • Images are automatically stored with the document for use on other machines for easy sharing.
  • Write in plain text or symbols with the functionality of a desktop
  • Includes fully flexible layout with guidelines, templates and rulers.
  • Allows for printing in any size, ready-to-fold single sheets or books.
  • Quickly and easily import pictures and photographs.
  • Allows for adding frames and bubbles.
  • Copy and paste to and from other applications.
  • Easily create grids for activities and timetable sheets.

Technical Specifications

  • Network friendly - Windows 10, 8, 7, Vista, XP compatible

Name: Widgit Communicate: Ideas
Description:
The Widgit Communicate: Ideas is a software program that combines visual tools of mapping with the support of Widgit Symbols. The Software program gives users the power to organise different kind of information, regardless of their difficulties with language and learning in the form of symbols  

Features

  • Includes a full Widgit Symbol Set and a large bank of clip art images.
  • Allows brainstorming of information, ideas, concepts and words.
  • A set of ready-made templates and example files are included for easy start up.
  • Easily add your own photos, sound, pictures, videos, clips and web links to mind maps.
  • Includes a speak aloud function which hears any of the words within your mind map.
  • Real time spell checker to ass less confident spellers to select the correct word.
 

Technical Specifications

  • Standard Single Licences
  • Additional Licences

Name: Widgit My First Mouse
Description:
The Widgit My First Mouse is a software programme that can be used to teach and assist younger children to use a mouse. The software programme is designed to be used by a child working along side an adult. It offers opportunities for language, exploration and developing computer skills. The activities are attractive and straightforward which includes a display of animated rewards when completed.  

Features

  • Designed for children learning to use a mouse for the first time.
  • Includes 3 suites of activities such as mouse click, drag and move which are graded to introduce successive skills and progression.
  • Includes five different scenarios.
  • Fun and easy learning.
 

Technical Specifications

  • Standard Licences

Name: Widgit Point
Description:
Widgit Point is a online tool that uses Widgit Symbols to assist visitors navigate to your website to improve thier understanding of written content. The Point displays a small box containing symbols illustrating the meaning of the word.  

Features

  • Assist People with learning to read.
  • Ideal for users with English as an additional language.
  • Suitable for users with reading difficulties.
  • Assist users with reading new or unfamiliar words enabling reinforcement of word meaning and building confidence.

Name: Widgit Insight
Description:
The Widgit Insight is a tool that allows you to create and display symbol supported content on your website, increasing access to information for many additional readers.  

Features

  •  The Widgit Symbols appear providing a visual representation of the meaning when the text is typed into insight.
  • Allows your to choose alternative symbols, change the size, colour and publish content directly to your website, learning platform, blog or wiki.
  • Insight offers flexibility to provide different levels of symbol support for your website readers
  • Insite gives you access to the most up-to-dat Widgit Symbol database.
  • The Widgit Symbol database currently holds more than 12,000 symbols, which provide visual representations for more than 40,000 words.
  • Insite currently supports 16 languages.

Name: Micro Speak Digital Voice Recorder
Description:
The Micro Speak Digital Voice Recorder is a digital voice recorder. The Micro Speak provides pupils and teachers with high definition recordings by pressing a button to playback through the built-in speaker.  

Features

  • Allows for talk for writing.
  • To capture voice memos on the move.
  • Ideal for role play and become the roaming reporter.
  • Assist with practicing for foreign languages.
  • Suitable for assessing Pupil Progress.
  • Record oral assessments.
  • Initiation of curriculum projects.
  • Can be used for thought tracking supporting inference and deduction.
  • Allows for capturing classroom discussion and debates.
  • Rehearsing music and drama scripts.
  • Podcasting.

Technical Specifications

  • Dimensions 105x60x25mm
  • Built in microphone
  • Rechargeable Battery. Recharge using Micro USB Port
  • Built-in memory. 512MB providing 6 hours of high quality recording time
  • Available in colours black and yellow

Name: Talking Tins
Description:
The Talking Tins is a record and playback device facilitate instantaneous and spontaneous thinking. The device can record music, speech or sound effects and allows for recordings in any language.  

Features

  • Ideal for teachers to use an educational resource for integrating with classroom teachings.
  • Spontaneous way to facilitate thinking.
  • Ideal for learning where the spoken word can be captured quickly and reviewed through listening.
  • Ideal for pupils to record and playback speech, listen to music recorded and sound effects.
  • Allows for messages to be recorded in any language.
  • Suitable for experimentation.

Technical Specifications

  • Dimensions 22mmx79mm diameter
  • Red allows for 40 seconds of recording time
  • Yellow allows for 10 seconds of recording time

Name: Multi Memo
Description:
The Multi Memo is a voice recording device that can record multiple messages with a total recording time of 6 minutes. The recording device can store up to 60 voice messages and can be played back on at a time by using the forward, skip and backwards buttons, also allows for deleting of messages if and when required.

Features

  • Includes a message lock switch feature at the back of the unit allowing the user to protect any messages from being accidentally erased.
  • Allows for engaging in activities such as recording dairy event schedules, planning procedures and organizing of appointments.
  • Ideal for creating shopping list.
  • Record telephone lists, reminders.
  • Buttons featured on the device are record, play, next, previous, erase.
  • Includes built-in Speaker.
  • Embedded microphone.
  • Red LED for indication of recording.
 

Technical Specifications

  • Requires 3xAG13 replaceable batteries
  • Messages are re-recordable - reuse time and time again!
  • Recording time: 6 minutes, (360 seconds)
  • Dimensions consist of 80mm diameter and 14 mm depth.

Name: Dry wipe board kit for Talking Tins
Description:
The Dry Wipe Boards are white boards that allow children to create listening and speaking activities. The boards come in different shapes including a heart, arrow, cloud and oval speech bubble. The Dry wipe board is a perfect accessory for Talking Tins.  

Features

  • Allows to attach to a variety of objects
  • KIT INCLUDES: 10 x Die Cut Dry Wipe Boards, (Plain White), (2 Hearts, 2 Arrows, 2 Clouds, 2 Speech Bubbles and 2 Rectangles A4), 10 x Self-Adhesive Metal Adapters to fit Talking Tins, 10 x Dry Wipe Pens, (Black Ink), 10 x Foam Erasers.

Technical Specifications

  • BOARD SIZES: Hearts - 350 x 200mm approx, Arrows - 360 x 240mm approx, Clouds - 360 x 220mm approx, Speech Bubbles - 360 x 240mm approx, Rectangles A4 - 300 x 210mm approx.

Name: Talking Tins Activity Book
Description:
The Talking Tins Activity Book is a book consisting of activities and includes 25 structured lesson plans with clear learning outcomes. The Activity Book covers activities to support the development of Spoken Fluency, confidence with words,  Listening and writing Skills. The Activities can be altered to suit all levels of ability such as phonics, interactive talking displays, mystery numbers, observing, thought tracking, treasure hunts, sequencing and matching.  

Features

  • Designed for the purpose of stimulating thinking and writing in all areas of the curriculum
  • Structured in simple steps which will enable the progression and challenge and can be easily adapted.
  • The activities have been designed to stimulate thinking and writing in all areas of the curriculum. They are structured in simple steps, which will enable progression and challenge and they can easily be adapted.
  • Talking Tins enable quick recording of pupils’ ideas to be done in a very simple way. Very young children can use it and it will facilitate some challenging thinking by older pupils.
  • Once you start using a Talking Tins you will soon develop more ideas to support speaking and listening. Let the pupils experiment and enjoy the pleasure of hearing themselves speak. It will really make a difference to the development of language skills in them all.

Name: Talking Tiles
Description:
Talking Tiles - now with a new shape!

The Talking Tiles are voice recordable tiles that record and playback 40 seconds of high  quality music, speech and sound effects. The recorder enables playback through the built-in microphone. This includes a clear removable cover which allows for words, symbols and pictures to match your recordings. The Talking Tiles provides you the option to record directly from a computer or CD Player. This can be used for AAC as a single message communication device, which is ideal in a special needs education (LSEN) or inclusive education environment or for switch training.  

Features

  • Includes a locking switch to protect messages from accidental erasure and wall mounting holes.
  • Ideal to use as an audible reminder.
  • Can be used as a reminder to fix near the front door to remind you to lock up and take the keys with you.
  • Used as a reminder to fix near domestic appliances to remind you how to set dials and buttons.
  • Suitable for Medication Management to notify you when and how to take your pills.
  • Allows for storage of emergency phone numbers.
  • Allows for Recording a message for a carer or visitor.
  • Record places, names and directions.
  • Ideal for remembering alarm settings and procedures.

Technical Specifications

  • Can be bought as single devices or in a pack of 6: 1x Red, 1x Yellow, 1x Green, 1x Blue, 1x Black and 1x White
  • Play Button, (Top Cover)
  • Record/Play/OFF Switch
  • Built-in Speaker
  • Built-in Microphone
  • AUDIO-IN Socket, (3.5mm), optional use.
  • Message protection feature
  • Removable clear cover
  • Wall mounting holes
  • Requires 3 x AAA batteries, (not included)
  • Recording time: 40 seconds, (one single message)
  • Size: 85 x 85 x 25mm
  • Messages are re-recordable - reuse time and time again!

Name: Talking Albums
Description:
The Talking Photo Album is a recordable photo album that enables pictures and photographs to be inserted. It allows for 6 minutes of recording time and offers a variety of uses. The album is suitable for people with visual impairments, Dementia and Altziemers. The photo album can be applied to activities for adults or children with special needs alternatively for anyone who wishes to have audible information readily available.  

Features

  • Ideal for preparing emergency contacts
  • assist with remembering important information
  • use for medication Management.
  • Include photographs of family, friends, holidays and special events.
  • Assist with organizing of  appointments.
  • Create Audio/Visual Procedures.
  • Diary Event Schedules.
  • Create a Talking CD or DVD Holder.
 

Technical Specifications

  • 20 pages in a 'flip style' Album.
  • Each of the 20 pages will hold a single 5x7" Photo or Image, (125x175mm).
  • Record a separate voice message on each page using the built-in microphone.
  • Total recording time: 6 minutes, maximum 18 seconds per page
  • Re-record as many times as you wish - reuse time and time again!
  • Each page has an individual PLAY/STOP Button.
  • Built-in Speaker
  • Black Hardback Cover.
  • Batteries are included and replaceable: 3 x AAA.
  • Recordings are preserved forever, even when batteries are replaced.
  • Size: 225 x 175 x 35mm Approx.

Description:
The Record-A-Card are recordable talking cards which allow for you to record and send your own personal voice message.  

Features

  • Allows for recording speech, sound effects and music.
  • The cards will play any audi recordings once opened.
  • messages can be re-recorded as many times as required.

Name: USB Recorder
Description:
The USB Recorder is a Voice Recorder and flash drive that allows you to create your own voice notes and memo’s wherever you are. It is a quick and easy way to record lectures, meetings, observations, interviews assessments and many more. It consist of 4GB of memory and can be used as a memory storage device  

Features

  • It’s a high quality digital voice recorder including an earphone socket that enables you to listen to music and your voice recordings.
  • Up to 5 hours recording time from a single charge.
  • Download all your recordings to your computer by simply plugging it into a USB port.
  • Save your recording onto your hard drive and enables your to play them using the standard software such as Windows Media Player.
  • Charge the USB Voice Recorder by plugging it into the USB port.
  • It is ideal for creating shopping and telephone lists.
  • Record emergency contacts, daily appointments, procedures and event schedules.
 

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

  • Includes switches such as Record and Power
  • Includes next and up buttons
  • Earphone socket
  • Embedded microphone
  • USB Plug Cover
  • Clip
  • Hole for Lanyard
  • Charges via USB
  • Memory: 4GB Recording Capacity: 48 hours
  • Recording Format: WAV File, 192 kbps, 48 kHz, 16 Bit, Mono
  • Playback Formats: WAV, WMA and MP3
  • Battery Life: Recording time 8 hours , Playing time 5 hours
  • Compatible with Windows 7, Vista, 2000, XP, Mac OS 8.6 or higher and OSX
  • Messages are re-recordable - reuse time and time again!
  • Rechargeable Battery
  • Dimension Size: 58 x 21 x 8mm

Name: PIR Motion Sensor
Description:
The PIR Motion Sensor is a devices which allows for Uploading your own speech, music or sound effects. The Motion Sensors has a unique MP3 file upload feature. Allows for using a Micro SD Card, (sold separately), to transfer MP3 sound files onto the internal memory.  Enables Your MP3 file to playback automatically after the PIR sensor has been activated.  

Features

  • Allows for Uploading an MP3 sound files with speech, music or any sound effect.
  • Update and change your message as many times as you wish.
  • Has automatic audio playback after the PIR sensor has been activated.
  • With high quality MP3 sound output.
  • Includes two volume settings: Low and High.
  • Includes two playback modes: Single sound repeat or loop repeat of multiple tracks.
  • Consist of wall mounting holes.
  • Includes an optional wall mounting bracket.
 

Technical Specifications

  • Has Two power supply options: 3 x AAA Batteries or Mains Power Adapter, (bought separately)
  • Mini USB Socket to support a 5 Volt DC Power Adapter
  • Micro SD Card Slot, (for uploading MP3 audio files)
  • Audio playback format: MP3 files only
  • Sensor activation distance: Up to 4 metres with a 120 Deg Angle
  • Internal Memory: 16Mb
  • Recording time allows for 120 seconds, (calculated at 128kbps MONO sample rate)
  • DimensionsSize: 90 x 60 x 25mm

Description:
Nessy Fingers is a software program that assist children to improve their spelling skills using real words and sentences which provide all the motivation required. The program also include activities and games that explores that land of Ness, battle dragons and ghosts. Crush Rocky under a giant snowball and score goals against the boss gorilla or win trophies in the hall of fame.  

Features

  • Improve spelling.
  • The keys positions are taught in the sequence of the alphabet.
  • Allows the teacher or educator to set personal speed and accuracy target activities.
  • Consist of nine adjustable levels of difficulty for assessment purposes.

  • Windows CD-Rom (home user)

Name: Helpikeys
Description:
Helpikeys is programmable membrane keyboard that is supplied with five standard overlays which are recognised by the keyboard when inserted under the protective membrane. This can be considered as an alternative keyboard  which is programmable and allows for designing and printing your own keyboard and mouse layouts.  

Features

  • Allows you to design and print your own keyboard and mouse layouts.
  • Able to memorise 5 customised layouts in its own memory enabling the layouts to be used on any computer.
  • Consist of additional configuration settings layout allows you to personalise the repeat and response rate as well as other characteristics.
  • Includes programmable five switch interface that can be used for moue control.
  • Comes in 5 different keyguard layouts namely numeric, mouse, yes/no, alphabetic and qwerty layout.

Technical Specifications

  • Dimensions size 460mm x 370mm x 25mm.
  • Includes 5 standard layouts with a configuration layout for configuring the device
  • layout Builder software to design and edit custom overlays
  • USB and PS2 cable
  • Compatible with MS Windows XP, MS Vista and Windows 7 64-bit operating systems.
  • Includes a user guide and removable stand

  • Ideal for users that are starting to use a keyboard for the first time.

  • Consist of a rollerball, scroll wheel and buttons that are built-in to access everything on the screen.
  • A robust, rubberised casing means the keyboard will stand up to everyday use.
  • Includes a key to control the volume and media player.
  • Consist of internet browser functions.

  • Its about the same size as a laptop keyboard enabling easy positioning.
  • The USB connector allows the device and a standard keyboard to be alternated without any set-up time.

Name: Accuratus K82D - USB Premium Mini Scissor Key Keyboard with Trackball
Description:
The Accuratus K82D mini keyboard is specially designed for meeting high spec requirements. Boasting one of the smallest footprints out of all Accuratus keyboards, the K82D is perfect for situations where space saving is essential. The keys on this keyboard are scissor key design, giving you a very soft and tactile touch for hours of comfortable typing. 
The K82D has an integral trackball with left and right mouse buttons giving the complete keyboard and mouse solution. With all these features, top quality design and durability the K82D is an ideal keyboard for every situation; office, home, POS and industrial  purposes.

Keyboard Features and Specifications

Keyboard Features: • USB ‘plug and play’ connection • Black case and keys (other colours made on request) • Mini UK key layout (other languages available on request) • FN key to multiplex some keys for number pad like on some laptops • Keys have a soft and tactile feel to allow for comfortable and natural typing • Slim true scissor key, key mechanism • Clear easy read key legends • Integrated 800dpi optical trackball with left and right mouse buttons • Status LED's (Caps, Num & Scroll Lock) • Designed with an internal metal plate to enhance the protection against ESD • Dimensions are compatible to Cherry G84-4400 keyboard • Brown box environment friendly packaging Physical Specifications • Dimensions (L x W x H): 370 x 139 x 20mm • Weight: 600g • Cable Length: 1.67 M

Description:
The Ultra Compact Keyboard is designed for users who find it difficult to reach all the keys of an ordinary keyboard or for those who like to 'fix' themselves and type using a small target area. The keyboard has the functionality of a standard keyboard layout.  

Features

  • Functionality of a standard keyboard layout but with a short travel distance and lightweight keys.
  • Suitable for users who are challenge by using a standard qwerty keyboard.
 

Technical Specifications

  • Dimensions: 218mm x 103mm x 15mm
  • This keyboard is as narrow as an A4 sheet of paper
  • USB plug and play with no software required

  • A clear angled rest which holds your laptop perfectly.

Name: Eye-Pal SOLO
Description:
The Eye-Pal SOLO is a self-contained reading machine. The device has been designed for users with low vision or who are blind to easily and quickly “read” the content or printed text by listening. It is fast, accurate and easy to use. The stand- alone desktop device does not require any training and allows for connecting it to an external monitor or home.

Features

  • Starts reading automatically.
  • Provides instant and near access to users to view books, texts, newspapers by reading aloud.
  • User friendly.
  • The Device provides users with independence and enriches their lives.
  • Reads the document in any direction.
  • Hand movement activation allows for control reading by movement of the hand over the page, and the responsive device will immediately stop reading the document.
  • To resume reading the user needs to wave the hand over the document to continue from the correct word.
 

Technical Specifications

  • Lightweight device consist of  7 lbs. and  9”x11”
 

Eye-Pal SOLO LV (Low Vision)

The Low Vision version of the EyePal SOLO adds magnification of the text being read - displayed on an optional screen via a VGA cable. In magnification mode, the SOLO LV also allows you to magnify small objects and show them on the screen. Click here to see the Eye-Pal SOLO LV.

Name: Victor Reader Stream CD Accessory
Description:
The Victor Reader Stream CD Accessory is a device that play CD’s onto a portable audio playback device.  

Features

  • It is an easy way to transfer a collection of CD’s onto  a single portable audio device without using a PC.
  • The device is ideal for users who do not use a PC.
  • The device is a perfect solution to transition from using VR Wave to VR Stream.
  • The CDCD player accessory especially designed to be used with the VR Stream.

Technical Specifications

  • Includes a power adapter
  • Includes a D-Shaped USB cable

Name: Brailliant BI 40
Description:
The Brailliant BI 40 Display is an advance device for braille users to conduct extensive reading with full comfort and intuitive display navigation. The device is portable and features an 8 key braille keyboard, thumb keys, space bars and cursor router keys. The Brailliant BI 40 is suitable for low vision and blind users.  

Features

  • Portable and easy to use.
  • Lasts up to 20 hours with Bluetooth.
  • Recharges from the PC through the USB port.
  • Auto-shut off.
  • Lithium-ion polymer battery.
  • Compatible with any standard USB A/C adapter.
  • Compatible with Windows computers (32 & 64 bit) Jaws, Window-Eyes, iOS (Apple devices), Mac computers, NVDA (NonVisual Desktop Access), System Access (Serotek).
  • Outstanding connectivity USB 2.0 and Bluetooth V2.1.
 

Technical Specifications

  • Dimensions  sizes Bl 32: 26 x 8.7 x 1.8 cm / 524 g (10.2" x 3.4" x 0.7" / 1.15 lbs.)
  • Bl 40: 31 x 8.7 x 1.8 cm / 650 g (12.2"x 3.4"x 0.7" / 1.43 lbs.)
  • B 80: 56.5 x 7.8 x 1.8 cm / 1070 g (22.3"x 3.1"x 0.7" / 2.35 lbs.)

Name: VoiceNote Apex BT
Description:
The VoiceNote Apex BT is a advanced device for braille users. Its allows for efficient braille computing in a digital world through internet connectivity and ample storage capacity. The VoiceNote Apex BT features an 8 dot Braille keyboard and is ideal for low vision and blind users.  

Features

  • Built-in options are at your fingertips to access Webpages ,retrieve files from your network and download emails.
  • Enjoy convenience of connectivity to keyboards and wireless accessories.
  • Connect to USB ports such as printers, hard drives, flash drive and embossers.
  • Synchronize information with your PC and keep an updated list of personal contacts and appointments.
  • Navigate with your computer screen reader using the Braille Terminal Mode.
  • 8 -dot Braille keyboard (BT model).
  • Speech output with choice of TTS.
  • Stereo speakers.
  • Internal Omni Directional Microphone.
  • Rechargeable and user-replaceable lithium-ion Battery.
  • Real-time Clock with 30-day battery backup.
  • External speaker / headphone and microphone jacks.
 

Technical Specifications

  • Microsoft Windows CE 6 operating system
  • 8GB of non-volatile user storage
  • 256 MB SDRAM
  • One SD card socket supporting SDHC cards
  • Built-in Ethernet port (10/100Mbps)
  • Built-in Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g protocol
  • Built-In Bluetooth 2.1
  • One high-speed USB 2.0 client port for Active Sync
  • 3 high speed USB 2.0 host ports
  • Optional USB voice modem
  • Optional GPS receiver via Bluetooth
  • Weight: 612 grams (1.35 lbs)
  • Dimensions: 19 mm (0.78 in) H x 244 mm (9.61 in) W x 143 mm (5.63 in) D
  • Processor: Freescale iMX31

Name: Index Basic-D V4 Embosser
Description:
The Index Basic-D V4 Embosser is a portable Braille printer. It uses fanforlded paper which is the most commonly used paper style for Braill embossers. The Embosser features 100 characters per second.  

Features

  •     It is the fastest embosser in its price range with 100 characters per second.
  •     It’s a High-quality interpoint Braille.
  •    Has a multilingual user interface with it  braille labelled and speech guided.
  •     Allows for Horizontal and vertical printing.
  •     Tractor-fed paper is the most reliable paper feeding method.
 

Technical Specifications

  • 2 year Warranty
  • Embossing speed CPS 100
  • Braille Font :2.2, 2.5, 3.2 mm
  • Tacticle Resolution 50 dpi
  • Formating method 13 hammers/anvil
  • Paper weight: 120-180 g/m2 (80-110 lbs)
  • Paper Width: 5-13inc
  • Paper length:1-17inc
  • Paper format are adjustable

Name: Index Braillebox V 4
Description:
The Index Braillebox V 4 is a braille box sheet embosser for a high production of braille. It uses cut sheet paper and has good quality sheet feeder to be used in a braille embosser with high durability and speed.  

Features

  • Excellent Braille dot quality.
  • The sheet feeder holds up to 400 pages.
  • Very stable sheet feeding.
  • Surprisingly low noise level.
  • Newspaper format.
 

Technical specifications

  • High speed - 900 pages per hour
  • Red Dot product design award 2011

Name: Prodigi Duo 2 in 1 electronic magnifier 20”
Description:
The Prodigi is the world's most advanced, digital personal vision assistant for people with low vision conditions such as macular degeneration, glaucom,a diabetic retinopathy, and other eye diseases.  The Prodigi is designed to be more HumanWare has designed Prodigi to be simple to use and more affordable than a traditional CCTV-based electronic magnifier.

The Prodigi Duo 2 in 1 electronic magnifier 20” is a desktop device which comes with a portable 5” HD magnifier with touch screen that fits into the table-top unit where readings are magnified for comfortable and efficient visualization with sustainable image quality. The simple touch and tap controls on the desktop device allows the user to place the document underneath the magnifier to tap and zoom for smooth flowing text. It’s adjustable to speed, contrast, colour, size and enables the user to go back to where they have left off without moving the page.

Features

  •  Diamond Edge Text - allows for words and letters to be outlined with sharp lines and maintains magnification with good readable quality words, and can be read aloud when preferred by the user.
  • Full Page Capture- Prodigi captures a copy of the full page and allows the navigation bar to move around the document and magnify the page enabling Optimal reading by a press of a single button to display the text. It can read the entire book aloud.
  • Reading Modes reads a single line for scrolling words with adjustable speed, and with a simple touch, you can stop, start, magnify and adjust speed to suit the user’s distinctive needs.
  •  Docking Station allows the user to place the tablet into the portable docking station cradle that is secured by latches including a 5” portable tablet which charges as long as it’s placed in the docking station and could be removed when ready to go. The user’s preference of headphones plugged into the device  allows the text to be read back to user.
Also have a look at the Prodigi Handheld Magnifier and the Prodigi Desktop solution. 
Video does not necessarily depict this model of Prodigi

Name: Kena: Ken-A-Vision Digital Microscope
Description:
The kena T-1050  is an easy-to-use, portable 3-in-1 digital microscope designed for the classroom, combining the capabilities of a compound microscope, stereoscope, and handheld discovery scope. The kena's unique, ergonomic detachable head fits in your hand for true portability. The kena USB connector efficiently powers the LED light on the head and lets you magnify capture, or modify images or video directly on your computer. The head fits nicely on its sleek, sturdy metal base that offers transmitted battery-powered LED lighting for specimens or slides and a stage pad material that eliminates the need for stage clips.  

Features

  • Award-winning, patented design
  • Bright and cool LED white light
  • Convenient handle/cord wrap
  • Sleek, sturdy metal base with practical silicone stage pad and easy-grip focus knobs
  • Includes touch tube adapter and carry/storage bag
  • Plug-and-play, compatible with Windows and Mac systems
  • Works with the FREE Educam app for BYOD collaboration
 

Technical Specifications

  • Pixel Count 640 × 480
  • Objectives 2×, 4×, 10×
  • Magnification 20× , 40×, 100×
  • Lighting Bright and cool LED white light
  • Requires 4 - AA batteries which are not included
  • Size L × W × H 18.5cm × 14.6cm × 22.9cm
  • Weight 3.3lbs / 1.5kgs
  • Warranty 1 year limited
    Download the Kena Digital microscope brochure: Kena T1050 Brochure_Edit Micro

Name: Eye-Pal Ace
Description:
The Eye-Pal Ace is a portable magnifier and reader designed to assist individuals who have challenges reading printed text. The device incorporates exclusive AudioMinder technology also allowing it to assist with your daily schedule.  

Features

  • The device is battery powered.
  • Its portable and easy to carry around making it an accurate and revolutionary electronic reader and magnifier.
  • Ideal for reading a book anywhere,  go through a menu at a restaurant, complete a form at the doctor’s office or accomplish a multitude of othertasks.
  • Easy plug in a pair of headphones in the front of the device, enabling the device to read out loud just to you in a crowded waiting room.
  • User Friendly.
  • Allows for setting an alarm to alert you to a time or wake you up
  • Record a reminder for an appointment.
  • Allows for sharing off uploaded products similar to a photo album
  • Allows for resuming after where you left off the last time.
  • To read a form and sign, place the form underneath the device’s camera and press the scan button
  • Take Eye-Pal Ace with you wherever you could use a reader. The Eye-Pal Ace will immediately begin reading the form out loud, displaying and highlighting the magnified text as it is being read (plug in a pair of headphones, so that no one hears your Eye-Pal Ace but you). Once done reading, place the last page under the Eye-Pal Ace's camera “eyes” again and choose the Live Magnification mode. See the signature line clearly and sign the document with confidence.
  • With no wires, cables or stick-out arms, with its natural feel and sleek design, Eye-Pal Ace is the one cool gadget to use at home and take along when on the go.
 

Technical Specifications

Display 10-inch (diagonal) color display
Document size A4 and Letter
Weight 3.5 lbs.
Power Rechargeable battery and/or AC
Controls Built-in thumbwheels and large buttons
Dimensions Hand-held: 11” x 10.5” x 3”
Camera Two 5 MP auto-focus HD cameras
Light source Dual anti-glare built-in ultra bright LEDs
Time to read Typically 3 seconds or less
AudioMinder Audio-guided Activity Center
Stored formats JPEG, MP3, TXT
Connection ports Headphone plug, power source plug, USB port
Energy-saving features Auto-standby preserves battery Auto-sleep mode for display
Language options Twenty-one world languages

Name: Zoom-Ex (end of life - refer to Prodigi Connect 12)
Description:
The Zoom-Ex is a durable but lightweight portable scanner device and is the world’s first instant book’s to speech tool. It scans the document, then magnifies the captured text and wraps the lines on-screen for easy reading. The device consists of a 2 ½ inch digital camera. The Zoom-Ex is a designed stand which serves as a guide for lining up the book or order document to be scanned. The camera is always at the exact distance needed to create a clear image, for blind users they  will always know exactly where to place the material to be scanned.  

Features

  • Select a Synthetic voice of your choice.
  • Text to Speech available.
  • To assist the blind  there are instructions and voice indicators available.
  • Photographing allows for instant scanning.
  • Fastest OCR (image-to-text) to date.
  • The Zoom-Ex offers instant capture with a still camera.
  • The patented motion detector allows for scanning 20 pages p/min without pushing a button, virtually hands free.
  • Once the flat page that is held at 4 corners is sensed as still, the image gets saved.
  • Allows for scanning odd pages separately from even ones, including upside down, the software will sort the pages properly.
  • Allows for capturing both pages at a time.
  • The camera field of view is easily felt by contact with edges at a right angle.
  • Create your own large print books by printing your pages.

Name: Victor reader stratus 12M Daisy MP3 player
Description:
Victor reader stratus 12M Daisy MP3 player is an audio book device, its advancement allows for Daisy and MP3 books to be played from multimedia sources such as CD’s, SD’s, USB’s, and text files saved to these external media can be played through the built in text to speech feature, it has digital sound quality for both music and books and adjust the playback speed to suit the user’s pace.  Pages in the book can be marked and saved to the device for the user to resume where they have left off.  

Features

  • Adjustable speed that plays back to read faster.
  • Its portable and has an integrated  handle and rechargeable battery.
  • Allows the user to set the timer according to the user’s preference.
  • The user may enjoy good audio quality for books and music played.
  • Consist of an information key which vocalizes book title’s, time periods, total pages and headings.
  • The book mark button allows the user to mark as many pages in a book or magazine and then later return to that position.
  • The ‘Where am I’ key states the current position that the user is at in the book.
  • The ‘key describer’ informs the user of each key on the device.
  • The device is portable, reachable and designed with a funky handle.
 

Technical Specifications

  •  Plays DAISY, Audio and MP3 CDs
  • Dimensions: 22 x 21.6 x 4.8 cm (8.7 x 8.5 x 1.9 in.)
  • Weight: 0.95 kg (2.1 lbs.) with battery
  • DAISY formats supported: 2.0 and 2.0.2
  • ANSI/NISO Z39.86 2002/2005 (DAISY 3)
  • Rechargeable Li-Polymer battery
  • Recharging time: 4 hours
  • Operating time: 10 hours for continuous play of DAISY MP3 books
  • Coding algorithms: AAC, AMR-WB , FLAC, MP3, Ogg Vorbis, Speex, WAV
  • Text-to-speech: Acapela (Stratus M) to play BRF, DOCX, RTF, txt, html, xml     files
  • Power jack: 2.5 mm (interior) / 5.5 mm (exterior)
  • Headphone jack: 3.5 mm
  • Firmware upgrade via CD or SD/USB (Stratus M)

Name: Prodigi Desktop electronic magnifier 24”
Description:
The Prodigi Desktop electronic magnifier 24” is a desktop device where readings are magnified for comfortable and efficient visualization with sustainable image quality. The simple touch and tap controls allows the user to place the document underneath the magnifier to tap and zoom for smooth flowing text. Its adjustable to speed, contrast, colour, size  and enables the user to go back to where they left off without moving the page.  

Features

  • Diamond Edge TextTM  allows for words and letters to be outlined with sharp lines and maintains magnification with good readable quality words, and can be read aloud when preferred by the user.
  •  Full Page Capture Prodigy captures a copy of the full page and allows the navigation bar to move around the document and magnify the page enabling Optimal reading by a press of a single button to display the text. It can read the entire book aloud. It also stores pictures in the gallary enabling the user acess at any time.
  •  Reading Modes reads a single line for scrolling words with adjustable speed, and with a simple touch, you can stop, start, magnify and adjust speed to suit the user’s distinctive needs.
  • Docking Station allows the user to place the tablet into the docking station cradle that is secured by latches, with preference headphones can be plugged in and the user can enjoy the text being read allowed in public places.

Name: Viewplus Premier 100 Embosser
Description:
The Viewplus Premier 100 Embosser is a heavy-duty braill production unit along with the added benefit of Tiger graphics-the most detailed raised graphics available from any braille embosser. It can create an entire braille book, complete with double sided braille text and tactile graphics all with a touch of a button.  

Features

  • Tiger super-high resolution graphics allows for high-speed braille.
  • It allows for automatic double-sided embossing-no flipping the paper.
  • Production-strength hardware made for running long hours.
  • Has a c ompact desktop size-smaller than most production embossers.
 

Technical Specifications

  • The purchase price includes a license for the Tiger Software Suite for braille translation
  •  Tiger embossers are also compatible with Duxbury and other braille and tactile graphics software

Name: Eye-Pal SOLO LV
Description:
The Eye-Pal SOLO LV is a reading and magnification device that can reads aloud almost any printed text.  In reading mode, the text is displayed on your screen (attached through a VGA cable) in high contrast and adjustable magnification.  In magnification mode you can use the device to magnify small objects.

Product Features

As a scanner/reader:

  •  Starts reading automatically
  • Hand motions can be used to stop or resume reading and to go back to one sentence
  • Fast and accurate
  • Displays magnified text on the monitor and highlights pronounced words
  • Allows the user to adjust font size and colors
  • Navigates text by word or by sentence
  • Saves up to four pages
 

As a magnifier:

  •  Magnifies small objects such as hearing aids and medicine bottles
  • Magnifies in three increments up to 12 times on a 19” monitor
  • Allows the user to adjust brightness
  • Wraps all text within the screen as magnification is increased

The Little Mouse is a small two button mouse that inclusive of  colour coded left and right click buttons. The green left click button is to go and the red right click is to stop. The device is suitable for educators who instruct young children how to use a computer mouse.

  • It’s easy to control.

Description:
The USB Charging hub for Micro-Speak 7 Ports is a device that allows for connection between the hub and mains power socket by using the adapter supplied and charging up to 7 Micro-Speaks at once. Use the device to connect to a computer by plugging in the USB cable supplied and transfer data between the Mico-Speaks and the computer.  

Features

  • Consist of 7 USB Ports including the A Type Sockets.
  • Allows for each USB socket to charge one device.
  • 7 devices can be charged at once.
  • The Mains Power Adapter included.

Name: Talking Photo Albums Deluxe
Description:
The Talking Photo Albums Deluxe is a recordable photo album that allows for pictures and photographs to be inserted. It allows for 200 minutes off recording time and consist of a SD Memory card. The talking photo album assist the user to stay independent and offers a variety of activities for children and adults with special needs such as visual impairments, Dementia and altziemers. Alternatively, it can be used by anyone who requires audible information as a quick reference.  

Features

  • Ideal for prepare Emergency Contacts.
  • Assist with remembering of important information
  • Include photographs of friends, family , special events and holidays.
  • Organizing of appointments.
  • Allows for creating audio/visual Procedures.
  • Record your diary event schedules.
  • Create a Talking CD or DVD Holder.
 

Technical Specifications

  • Consist of 20 pages in a 'flip style' Album.
  • Each of the 20 pages will hold a single 5x7" Photo or Image, (125x175mm).
  • Record a separate voice message on each page using the built-in microphone.
  • Total recording time: 200 minutes, across 20 pages, (e.g. 10 minutes per page)
  • Re-record as many times as you wish - reuse time and time again!
  • Each page has an individual PLAY/STOP Button.
  • Earphone Socket for personal listening, (3.5mm Phono).
  • Built-in Speaker with Volume Control.
  • Removable SD Card memory storage. 2GB SD Card supplied FREE, (worth £10)
  • Insert a 6x4" Photo into the Front Cover.
  • Batteries are included and replaceable: 3 x AAA.
  • Recordings are preserved forever, even when batteries are replaced.
  • Size: 225 x 175 x 35mm Approx.
  • Black Faux Leather Cover.

Name: Talking Photo Album Activity Book
Description:
The Talking Photo Album Activity Book is a talking book that explains how to produce talking stories, scrap books, non-fiction texts and diaries to support any curriculum area. It shows you can produce high quality sound-enabled information booklets to share with the whole school community. The Talking photo album activity book is light, portable and easy to carry around, it can be used for home based learning and out-of-hours clubs. The Talking album can be used as a teaching tools for learning and provides a framework for linking visual material, writing, music, words, sound efffects to narrative, audio and kinaesthetic learning.

Features

  • Suitable for home school communication.
  • Can be used to enable parents and carers to stay in contact with their family when they are not at home.
  • Ideally used for assessment for Learning (AfL) tool.
  • The albums can be used formatively by showing progression in a child's oral development over a period of time and suitable for practitioners/ peers to provide oral feedback for each other.
  • They can also be used summatively to showcase children's narrated, written and graphical work.

Technical Specifications

  • Size: A4
  • No. of Pages: 15
  • No. of Activities: 12

Name: SMALLtrack trackball
Description:
The SMALLtrack trackball  is a simple rollerball that has been designed  for small hands. It is alternate to a standard mouse and is perfect for young children who are learning cursor control. The device consist of a bright contrasting rollerball and coulourful right and left buttons for easy navigation.  

Features

  • Its fun and user friendly.
  • It is alternate to a mouse.
  • Has bright right and lelft clicks.
  • Includes a colourful rollerball for free user mobility.
 

Technical Specifications

  • The rollerball is 5cm in diameter and 6cm height (including rollerball)
  • Dimensions are 14cm ear to ear x 12cm top to bottom
  • SMALLtrack USB

Name: PC Max KidTrac
Description:
The PC Max KidTrac is a large three button trackball,  affordable, sturdy and Microsoft compatible. The device acts as a natural hand rest. The rollerball can be accessed with more complex software such as Clicker.  

Features

  • Its affordable and user friendly.
  • consist of a colour coded three button trackball.
  • The centeral key is green and acts as a drag lock by pressing the drag button. The button stays locked until you press a second time to unlock.
  • The device allows for mouse-click access to some of the simple switch software.

Technical Specifications

  •  Supplied with USB connector
  • Compatible  with a  PC

Description:
The Microspeed PC-TRAC/MAX-TRAC is a three button trackball. The trackball includes a low profile case acting like a natureal hand rest and reduces wrist angle  by mirroring the natural contour of the hand.

  • Its user friendly and affordable.
  • Its Microsoft compatible.
  • Easy to plug into your computer through the USB port.

Name: OPTIMAX Wireless Joystick
Description:
The OPTIMAX Wireless Joystick is a uniqure wireless joystick that is ideal for users with motor skill difficulties  

 Features

  • Inclueds 3 different handles.
  • There is no interference with the operating range exceeding 10 metres.
  • Effective response to the lightest touch.
  • Suitable to use in group sessions or in the classroom.
  • Receiver unit comes with two additional sockets.
  • Used for precise tracking and cursor control.
  • There are four cursor speed settings.
  • The low profile provides a natural hand rest for comfortable operation.
  • It's a large footprint for stability.
  • use your own switches to operate the left and right click buttons.
  • Has Left and right and drag lock buttons.
  • Its colour coded buttons are mounted sub-flush to prevent accidental activation.
  • Quick and easy plug and play installation.
 

Technical Specifications

  • The OPTIMAX Wireless Joystick is PC and Mac compatible.
  • Includes 1 x 9V battery.

Name: OPTIMAX Wireless Rollerball
Description:
The OPTIMAX Wireless Rollerball is the very first wireless trackball. The rollerball is suitable for users with motor skill difficulties and those with limited hand mobility. The device can be used in the classroom, individually or in a group. The lightweight Roller ball can be used as a hand-held unit or as a desktop, allowing for precise cursor control and a silky-smooth ball movement experience. The bi-directional radio link offers interference free operation.  

Features

  • Has two additional sockets for switches.
  • Allows for precise tracking and cursor control.
  • Allows the large free-running ball to be activated by the lightest touch.
  • A natural hand rest allows for comfortable mobility
  • Drag and lock features with left and right drag lock buttons.
  • Consist of colour coded buttons that are mounted sub-flush to prevent accidental operation.
  • Trackball sockets to operate left/right click buttons from remote switches.
  • With easy plug and play installation.
 

Technical Specifications

  • Auto detecting PS2 and USB protocols
  • Compatible with Mac and PC
  • battery life lasts for Up to 6 months
  • Includes1 x 9V battery

Name: Orbitrack
Description:
The Orbitrack is an computer navigational device which allows for users to control the direction and speed of the cursor with a soft and light touch. This device is suitable for young users with motor impairment and motor skill difficulties eliminating hand or wrist movement. The Orbitact can be used to manage cursor movement by using a control ring for precise targeting of objects on the screen.  

Features

  • Is a unique cursor control technology.
  • Has a large, 50mm cursor control ring for easy operation and precise targeting.
  • No pressure required for this soft touch operation.
  • Its ultra reliable with no mechanically moving or wearing parts.
  • Its sealed against the ingress of fluids.
  • Its ergonomic design allows for a comfortable wrist position on the sloped case  and large palm or hand rest area.
  • Symmetrical design allows use with either hand.
  • colour coded left, right click, double-click and drag lock buttons require a slight touch.
  • Buttons easily accessed without the need for hand and wrist movement.
  • Four speed settings.
  • Resettable memory provides an orientation facility, switchable left and right click buttons, on/off audible alert signals and smart acceleration option.
  • Your personal settings are stored in memory and will be retrieved each time the computer is powered up.
 

Technical Specifications

  • Auto detecting PS2 and USB protocols
  • No additional drivers required with easy plug and play installation
  • Compatible with PC and Mac

Name: J-Pad Joystick for iPad
Description:
The J-Pad Joystick for iPad is a joystick interface that provides comprehensive switch access to all iPad functions inncluding  Apps, music and media, iBooks, still and video photography and on-screen keyboard entry. The joystick allows for wireless connection to the iPad by using bluetooth 2.1.  

Features

  • Easy to set-up and easy to use.
  • Includes optional touch-sensitive buttons to launch and close Apps
  • Provides two sockets to connect up to two wired switches.
  • Joystick scanning access to your iPad including Apps, Music and Photography.
  • Unique line by line scanning facility.
  • Fully supports iBooks page turning.
  • Wireless operation via Bluetooth 2.1.
  • Optional touch-sensor buttons, or plug in external switches.
  • Integral, rechargeable lithium-ion battery.
 

Technical Specifications

  • Works with iPad (all types inc. mini), iPod Touch (3rd and 4th generation) and iPhone (3GS, 4 and later).
  • J-Pad has an integral rechargeable battery which can be charged via any USB socket and which provides up to 30 hours usage between charges.

Name: SMART Board 6065 Interactive Panel for Education only
Description:
The SMART Board 6065 is an interactive flat Panel with a dual touch allowing students to collaborate interactively. SMART introduces its multi -colour Pen ID display allowing for engagement between students seamlessly collaborating by using different colour ink with the pens. The SMART Board Interactive Flat Panel is cost effective and user friendly offering multiple ways to collaborate leaving students, focused, excited and engaged.  

 Features

  • Brings lesson content to life with the Ultra HD 4K imagery resolution ensuring that students remain engaged from anywhere in the classroom.
  • The flat Panel provides premium touch experiences with its low friction coated surface which delivers a natural touch functionality resulting in lessons running as seamlessly as the display's responsiveness.
  • The Pen and Object ID feature detects whether you are using your pen, eraser, finger or palm, saving you confusion and time spent on detecting which mode you are in.
  • SMART's first Pen ID display allows for two users  to collaborate  with different coloured ink pens simultaneously creating more interactive engaging experiences. This eliminates you to be locked into the choice of your partner.
  • Seamless collaboration allowing two students to simultaneously use the touch gestures on the display and develop essential collaborative skills without even realizing it.
  • The SMART Notebook software is integrated with the SMART Board 6065 model  interactive flat panelfor immediate engagement

Name: n-ABLER PRO Rollerball
Description:
The n-ABLER Pro Rollerball is an alternative mouse device designed specifically for users with motor skill difficulties and limited hand mobility, involuntary muscle spasms and hand or hand/wrist tremors, poor hand/eye-coordination and limited manual dexterity. Using the n-ABLER Pro Rollerball could also result in less wrist and elbow fatigue.  

Features

  • Suitable for users of all age groups with mobility and motor skills difficulties and those who use the computer for long periods.
  • The summetical design allows users to work with the right or left hand and the integrated palm and hand rest enables work posture to be more relaxed.
  • Reduces tension and strain.
  • A large footprint for maximum stability with tough an ergonomic design.
  • The pan button allows for easy navigation.
  • Easy cursor control.
  • All buttons have white legends on black backgrounds for easy identification of button functions.
  • Consist of  double click and latching drag lock buttons.
  • Switchable left and right click buttons.
  • Is switchable to mute and visual warnings indicating selection or change of function.
  • Anti-tremor button (with three settings to compensate for the degree of tremor) to improve cursor control. Cursor Speed can also be controlled.
  • Easy 'plug and play' installation (no additional drivers required).
  • 63mm, free-running ball for easy cursor control.

Technical Specifications

  • Dimensions 23.3 x 13.3 x 12.8cm.
  • n-ABLER Pro Rollerball USB

Name: Glidepoint USB Touchpads
Description:
The Glidepoint USB Touchpad is alternate to a standard mousing device which allows you to simply glide your finger over the surface and tap it gently or click the buttons to perform all input functions. There are 3 categories of desktop touchpads to choose from finding a solution to fit your digital lifestyle.  

Features

  • Glidepoint USB Touchpad enables easy and comfortable navigation to your computer forming basic mouse functions
  • glide, point, press and tap to activate the designated areas of the pad.
  • The change of pad texture and colour feature allows for easy right click detection by double tapping and holding your finger on the pad
  • The GlideExtend feature enables easy movement of the cursor after you  have run into the touchpad's edge.
  • The one touch, zoom and scroll with distinctive sounds for each operation combining all the mouse functions into one durable touchpad.
  • The programmable software allows you to go from fast on-screen movements to pixel point control. Quickly activate vertical/horizontal scrolling as well as magnification tools by gliding a finger along the touchpad edges.
  • Cirque's capacitive touch technology provides complete navigation control of any graphical interface, packed in a space saving, low friction, durable touchpad.
 

Technical Specifications

  • Easy Cat Glidepoint Touchpad
  • Smart Cat Glidepoint Touchpad
  • Smart Cat Pro Glidepoint Touchpad

Name: Lumens CL510 ceiling
Description:
The Lumens CL510 ceiling is a high definition document camera designed to be mounted on the ceiling. This requires no desktop hardware, lectern or podium. The Lumens CL510 ceiling model is ideal for presentations allowing for a clear line of sight for the audience. The  CL510 provides Full HD-1080p resolution with a professional grade 25x optical zoom, up to 30 frames per second speed providing excellent image quality. The Lumens CL510 ceiling is suitable for auditoriums, lecture theatres and prestation rooms.  

Features

  • Includes full HD 1080p high-definition output resolution.
  • Optimization function with a touch of a button.
  • Intelligent time stamp on saved files.
  • Offers high-definition USB image transmission in real time.
  • No installation required with easy plug and play.
  • Consist of a customized video splash screen.
  • Projector type (DLP/LCD) select mode.
  • The Lumens CL510 ceiling has a free multi-functional cross platform software support.
  • Compatible with all major IWB brands.
 

Technical Specifications

  • Optical Zoom: 25X
  • Digital Zoom: 5X
  • Output Resolutions: XGA, SXGA, WXGA, UXGA, 1080p
  • Frames Rate: 30fps ( Max)
  • Shooting Area: distance at 2m, max at 1,200mm x 900mm, min at 48 x 36mm
  • Lamp: Laser Indicator
  • power: External, 12V DC Adapter (100-240VAC)
  • Output: VGA, DVI, USB, Ethernet
  • Control: RS-232, USB, Ethernet
  • Memory Slot: USB Flash Drive
  • Built in Memory: 120 Picture
  • Image Rotation: Full screen image rotation from 0, 90,
  • 180, to 270 degrees
  • Standalone AV Recording: Video Recording
  • Projector Mode: DLP/LCD mode
  • Free software: Podium View ( Mac, Win, 7,8, Vista, XP)

Name: WriteOnline
Description:
WriteOnline is an innovative software program that has been designed to assist learners with writing by enabling them to structure their ideas and create logical coherent documents. WriteOnline can be used to develop a student's writing ability in any subject. The software program is ideal for those learners who have brilliant ideas but struggle to get them down on paper. WriteOnline is age appropriate and can be used across the curriculum with its great quality speech and unique Wordbar.  

Features

  • Suitable from age 9 to adult.
  • Includes a topic-related word bank and writing frames.
  • Allows for usage across the curriculum.
  • It allows for organising ideas with the use of mind maps.
  • Review writing with clear speech.
  • The word prediction feature allows for independent writing.
  • The Wordbar brings curriculum writing tasks within the reach of all your learners by giving instant point and click access to subject-specific words and phrases.
  • WriteOnline's document analysis tool allows you to access each student's writing process, including a complete history of time spent on a document. With this tool, teachers can also see a full analysis of spelling errors that have been corrected with the spellchecker and whether any text has been copied and pasted into the document by the student.
 

Technical Specifications

  • Single Computer License
  • 5 Computer License
  • 10 Computer License
  • 30 Computer License
  • Primary School Site License
  • Secondary School Site License

Name: Dolphin SaySo
Description:
The Dolphin SaySo is a reading & writing toolbar designed for people with dyslexia. The toolbar uses human sounding voices and highlights the words as they are spoken. The Dolphin SaySo reads aloud as you type word documents, browse the web or access Word documents and emails. With the Dolphin SaySo writing does not have to be a struggle, it enhances your ability to write confidently, complete projects, email your colleagues and update your online status'. The user friendly toolbar ensures that you have made no mistakes. The Dolphin SaySo is suitable for users with dyslexia or anyone wanting to build confidence with writing and reading.  

Features

  • Save documents and pages in formats such as MP3s, DAISY player.

What's included in SMART Learning Suite?

Name: BIGtrack Trackball Switch adapted (excludes switch)
Description: BIGtrack 2.0 is a USB mouse that includes a large 3-in / 7.62-cm trackball. The sturdy base of BIGtrack 2.0 allows the user to easily move and position the mouse cursor on the computer screen while using fine or gross motor movements of the hand, arm, or foot. Once the mouse cursor is positioned, two over-sized buttons are available for left and right clicking. Available on Tender RT275-2019 Tender Number: 85122108-00043 Drag Lock The drag lock feature enables a user to move objects on the screen without having to hold the mouse click button down. To activate the drag lock feature, position the mouse cursor over the item you would like to move. Once the cursor is positioned, double right click to lock onto the item. Once locked, the user can move the item with the trackball. Once a desired location is reached, activate either the right or left click button one time to release the object. Switch Access BIGtrack 2.0 includes two 1/8-in / 3.5-mm mono (TS) switch jacks. Plugging in a switch on the left side of BIGtrack 2.0 will enable the left click via the switch. Plugging in a switch on the right side of BIGtrack 2.0 will enable the right click via the switch. Switch are not included and sold separate. Compatiblity BIGtrack 2.0 is compatible with most laptop, desktop, and tablet computers that can use a standard mouse. One USB Type A receptacle is required.

Name: Dynamo Maths
Description:
Dynamo Maths Remediation Program

Dynamo Maths is a step-by-step learning program that supports the needs of children struggling with maths.  The solution is packaged in a three-stage on-line intervention and remediation program for dyscalculics and low maths achievers. The software has been specifically designed for learners with learning difficulties such as dyscalculia, dyslexia and Autistic Spectrum Disorder.  The software is based on the NumberSenseMMR framework. Ideally, Dynamo Maths would be combined with a Dynamo Profiler Assessment, identifying areas of weakness and dyscalculia symptoms for development.  Dynamo Profiler can be used as a pre-assessment for remedial educators to establish whether the leaner requires further professional  supportive learning. Dynamo Maths can then be incorporated into a learner's Individual Support Plan (ISP). Dynamo Maths can also be integrated with curriculum activities in special needs and main stream schools.
  • Stage 1: Lesson Plans
Over 230 multisensory pre-prepared Lesson Plans with printable resources written by dyscalculia experts. Each lesson plan is designed to engage the child with specific areas of dyscalculia or maths difficulties and develop conceptual understanding, thinking strategies and confidence with numbers.
  • Stage 2: On-line Interactive Modules
Over 230 online interactive remediation modules designed to remediate dyscalculia difficulties and develop automaticity and intuitiveness with numbers through practice and reinforcement.  The On-line Interactive modules have a simple and powerful reporting that informs you instantly of the gaps in learning.
  • Stage 3: Dynamic Worksheets, Reinforcement and Reflection phase.
Over 230 dynamic printable Worksheets emulate the On-line Activities.

Features

  • Ideal for students with learning difficulties such as dyscalculia.
  • Dynamo Maths is a combination of assessments and fun activities promoting maths among learners.
  • Includes a curriculum and dyscalculia reference that can be integrated with lessons.
  • It's an age-appropriate assessment that can be adapted to suit the learner's developmental profile for maths and numbers to be captured.
  • The report systems enable remedial educators to understand the possible reasons for difficulties in their learning and structure interventions to take place and support the learner's development.

What is Dyscalculia?

Dyscalculia is a condition that affects the ability to acquire mathematical skills.  Dyscalculic learners may have difficulty understanding simple number concepts, lack an intuitive grasp of numbers, and have problems learning number facts and procedures.  This pattern of abilities and weaknesses is known as ‘specific learning difficulties’. Purely dyscalculic learners who have difficulties only with numbers will have cognitive and language abilities in the normal range and may excel in nonmathematical subjects, or they may be found to have language difficulties as well, such as dyslexia.

What about Dyslexia?

Dyslexia is a spectrum of disorders that involve difficulty in learning to read or interpret words, letters, and other symbols. Often, those who have difficulties in deciphering written words should also have difficulty in learning the sets of facts, notation and symbols that are used in mathematics.  This pattern of abilities and weaknesses is known as ‘specific learning difficulties’. Dyslexics usually experience problems with the language of mathematics, sequencing, orientation and memory, rather than with the mathematics itself.  Dyslexic learners find it difficult to produce mental or written answers quickly, and the need to ‘learn by heart’ for pupils who have poor memory systems may well result in failure and lack of self-belief. Some dyslexic learners will enjoy the flexibility of approach and methods while, for others, choice creates uncertainty, confusion and anxiety.

Dynamo for Autism

It is a well known fact that children with Autistic Spectrum Disorder (ASD) have special interest in numbers through repetitive behaviors and can take the form of intense preoccupations or obsessions.  With some children, this extreme interests in numbers, symbols, dates or locations on maps can take years before the understanding of maths concepts behind numbers emerges. Children with ASD demand extreme consistency in their environment and daily routine and there is tendency to engage in a restricted range of activities. Like many other skills that we also need to teach children with ASD the mathematical concepts and the developmental stages need to start with the foundations of number sense before counting.  Dynamo Math modules start at very basic level of Visual Patterns, building in small steps towards maths concepts. The modules provide an opportunity to build confidence through visual online activities, as well as teaching of number concepts on a one-to-one through touch, feel and play using the structured teaching lesson plans. The lesson plans are designed to play games that help develop conceptual understanding, thinking strategies and confidence with maths. Read about Dynamo Maths being used at Foxwood Primary School, where all children up to the age 19 have ASD.

Licensing Options

Dynamo Maths is available as a school license or home license option Licensing is annual, and depends on the number of student user accounts

Name: Zygo Head Pointers
Description:
Zygo Head Pointers is an alternative mouse device.  It uses the chin to provide efficient pointing from psychologically and cosmetically sound perspective. The device allows closer proximity to the item being accessed and reduces the head movement needed to activate such a device.

Features

  • The standard model can be individually fitted to head sizes from 20-25 inches in circumference.
  • Its fully adjustable.
  • Tiny Tot model is specially designed for small heads from 17-20 inches.
  • The headband has a rear strap adjustment and the yoke assembly is sized for these smaller heads.
  • Rear Strap model is a standard size but the rear knob adjustment portion of the standard model’s headband has been replaced with a hook and loop strap closure. This is particularly useful when the user is seated against any headrest mechanism, preventing the standard model’s knob  to cause discomfort. This model also accommodates adult wearers with slightly smaller than average head sizes, for which the overall yoke size reduction of the Tiny Tot model is inappropriate.

Description:
Trading and Profit & Loss Account is a software program that provides students with the necessary skills and knowledge to assist them to produce a trading and profit & loss account. The software explains and demonstrates how to calculate profit or loss, costs and sales.  

FEATURES

  • Includes a two part activity where students have to produce a trading and profit and loss account.
  • A quiz that includes 15 interactive questions that test students’ knowledge of the trading and profit and loss account.
  • Additional notes and study material provides a broader understanding of the Trading and Profit & Loss Account.
  • Worksheets provide a summary activity that reinforces the information covered in the Interactive chart and can performed in the classroom or even at home.
  • Ideal for use on VLE learning platforms.
 

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

  • Classroom License
  • Site License
  • Compatible with Mac and PC’s, Interactive whiteboards, projectors, slates and tablets

Description:

The software is structured in easy-digestible sections that introduces students to the meaning of ICT and further investigates ICT Systems and the associated elements.  

Features

  • A quiz containing 15 interactive and printable questions which will test students' knowledge of ICT & ICT Systems.

Name: GuideWELD Live - Welding Guidance System
Description:
GuideWELD LIVE - Welding Guidance System

As featured in Engineering News: A revolutionary guidance system for training welders - the new guideWELD™ LIVE real welding guidance system can help schools, training centres and companies to virtually put a welding instructor in every booth! This is not virtual welding - this is the real thing!  The complementary product, GuideWELD VR  virtual welding system, can be used to train beginners in a virtual (cost saving) environment. The Guideweld LIVE system can be used in arc-off or while actually welding.  Perfect practice makes perfect welders. This is the first system of its kind, launched at Electramining 2014 and featured in the Engineering News.

Actual Welding Helmet

The guideWELD LIVE system consists of a welding gun sensor and specialised welding helmet with visual display that provides immediate feedback on work angle, travel angle and speed.  This feedback happens live, during real life welds with real materials. By providing feedback on these three core aspects of welding technique, guideWELD LIVE allows students to learn correct welding form an positioning, makes instructors more available to provide individualized instruction and increases the safety of their learning environment. The guideWELD™ LIVE system offers these great features and benefits in a cost-effective package. The Guideweld Live system also includes
  • Curriculum written by a certified welding instructor that includes 3 units: Welding Safety, Welding Defects and Welding Specifications
  • Welding Inspection Tutorial for student use
  • Presentation slides, teacher guides, student worksheets, quizzes and exams
  • 9 Welding Procedure Specifications, with customizable WPS's also available
 

Watch an introductory video on GuideWELD LIVE

Please contact us to arrange a demonstration. Don't forget to check out GuideWELD VR  - the virtual welding simulator for early welding.

Name: GuideWELD VR - Welding Simulation
Description:
Affordable  Welding Simulator

Guideweld VR is the latest, most affordable virtual welding simulator available for wlding training in schools , FET Colleges and industry-level training from Realityworks.

Features

  • A stand-alone virtual reality MIG welding simulator - No internet, no licensing fees
  • Software installs locally on your computer
  • Real-time guides assist with developing correct technique
  • Record student’s virtual welds
  • No licensing fees
  • Create your own welding assignments through customizable WPS’s
  • 30 hours of curriculum
  Record students' welds and view, save and print individual assessments on  work angle, travel angle, speed and contact to work distance (CTWD).  Once students are proficient in their technique, use the complementary project GuideWELD LIVE with live welding on the workshop floor to continue their guidance with actual welding. Perform virtual welds, for training or pre-testing on the following:
  • Tee, lap and butt joints
  • Steel, aluminum and stainless steel
  • 3 different metal thicknesses
  • 3 levels of difficulty
Please contact us to arrange a demonstration. Don't forget to check out GuideWELD LIVE - the live welding guidance system that puts an instructor right in your welding booth.

Description:

  • Assembly instructions included

Name: PH Pack
Description:
The PH Pack can be used for experimentation in subjects such as chemistry, biology and environmental studies. The pack includes a pH adaptor and the pH electrode to form the immensely popular pH sensor.  

Features

  • Ideal for experiments in outdoors or in the classroom
  • The Smart Q ph sensor consist of a pre-set calibration range and a user calibration range
  • Can be used for testing acids, alkalis, acid-base titrations, acide rain
  • Suitable for testing water quality in any environment
  • Ideal for biology experiments such as human, cell and photosynthesis respiration also includes testing dissolved oxygen in water.
  • Maintains the level of storage solution
 

Technical Specifications

  • Requires the  pH sensitive glass membrane must be kept wet
  • Store the electrode tip in a 1:1 solution of pH 4 buffer and 3.5 to 4 mol dm-3 KCl

Name: Spectrometer
Description:
Spectrometer is general purpose instrument with applications in Chemistry, Physics, and Biology. Its cost effective with a small footprint laboratory. Through research studies the device can be used trace drug and criminal detection.  

Features

  • Can be used as a spectrometer and spectrohotometer
  • The system consist of a spectrometer base unit, USB cable, cuvette holder optical fibre accessory
  • Straightforward, clear and comprehensive spectrometer software
  • Shows data in the format of a table
  • Collects and compares multi spectra
  • Convert intensity vs wavelength to Emission Line format. Intensity shows weak and strong emissions
  • microscope visibility
  • Includes chemistry, biology and physics applications
 

 Technical Specifications

  • Optical fibre accessory- 1.2m
  • USB Cable

Name: Primary Engineer - Structures and Mechanisms
Description:
The Primary Engineer is a software program that provides support to technology and design. The software is ideal for learners from grade 1-6 and is suitable to be used with an interactive whiteboard.  

Features

  • Includes teachers notes
  • Suitable to be used with an interactive whiteboard in a classroom environment
  • Include 49 lesson plans and extension opportunities
  • practical Design and Technology activities include winding up, moving pictures, vehichles, homes, photograph frames, controllable vehicles and shelters

Technical Specifications

  • Full Site Licence.
  • Suitable for all interactive whiteboards using either Activprimary or Activprimary Viewer (included on CD-ROM), enabling teachers to use this resource on any interactive whiteboard.

Name: Go Control Software
Description:
The Go Control is a software program that offers graphical programming. The software is simple to use and highly functional, based around industry flowcharting standards. It can be used as a stand alone simulation or a real control application. Go Control software is suitable for primary school learners.  

Features

  • Suitable for students from age 8-18
  • with the addition of suitable control interfaces
  • Town ACEs inlude Zebra Crossing, town hall, train level crossing, pelican crossing and bridge lights
  • Consist of model Pack One ACEs such as lighthouse, car alarm and fairground
  • Model Pack Two ACEs consist of  bee,traffic light and washing machine
  • Compatible interfaces for Go Software  includes FlowGo, Solo 18, Solo 28 and Contact Controller

Name: Kid K'NEX Classroom Collection
Description:
Kid K'NEX Classroom Collection is an educational model set for nursery school children. This is ideal for a classroom environment as it enables for children to learn and play interactively. This set allows for 23 models to be built enough pieces to support 8 - 10 children that can build simultaneously.

  • Consist of vibrant pieces to stimulate a child's imagination and creativity
  • Models are easily assemble and can be quickly dismantled
  • The Kid K'NEX Classroom Collection  set builds models including a butterfly, elephant, fish, caterpillar and flower
  • Provides teaching opportunities such as colour recognition, stacking, sorting, sequencing pattern recognition, copying patterns, fine motor skill development & practice, common shapes, characters & props for role play and reading activities

  • Packed in a large storage tub with a snap-on lid

Name: Intermediate Maths Set
Description:
The Intermediate Maths Set is a hands on mathematics learning system for primary school learners. The set covers 2D & 3D shapes, relationships, patterns, measuring with non-standard units and fractions  

Features

  • Consist of 1279 piece set
  • Provides a hands-on mathematics learning and development experience for children in groups of 8-10
  • Covers 2 & 3 D shapes
  • Suitable for ages 7 and up
  • Can build up to 95 maths and geometry models
  • this includes enough K’NEX parts to support 12 - 16 students working in teams of 3 - 4.
  • Allows four groups of students to build up to 12 identical models simultaneously
  • Student groups are able to work on different projects at the same time to support differentiated instructional strategies.
  • 4 building instruction booklets to guide student’s mathematics modelling included
  • Build Angles, Polygons, Prisms, Pyramids, Cubes, Fraction Models, Area and Perimeter Challenge, models and many more
  • Includes a comprehensive teacher's guide
  • Key concepts include characteristics Properties of Polygons, Congruence and Similarity, Area and Perimeters, Surface Area and Volume, characteristics/Properties of Polyhedra, Fractions, Decimals, Money and Percents, Linear Patterns and Algebraic Equations, Line and Rotational Symmetry, and transformations
 

Technical Specifications

  • Packaged in a strong storage tray with lid.

SmartScope 5M is a handheld digital microscope consisting of 5 Mega Pixel memory. The USB device can used to capture images. Magnify and connect it to your pc to view your images.

  • 5mp memory
  • Caputure pictures, videos and time-lapse videos

Description:
The SmartMicroScope 5M-500 is a handheld digital microscope designed for science experiments and projects suitable for primary grades.  The device is easy, versatile and powerful to use. When live images from the SmartMicroScope5M-500 are displayed, it allows you to take pictures and videos while the object is moving.  

Features

  •  The SmartMicroScope include activities such as viewing the different stages of mitosis
  • Able to distinguish whether plant & animal cells are different or alike
  • Identify what type of  species live in pond water
  • Illustrates what insect eyes look like
  • Ideal discovery tool for all grades

Name: Vu Heart Rate Sensor
Description:
Vu Heart Rate Sensor is a device for primary school learners who are studying how stress affects their heart rate. The sensing clip can easily be attached to an ear lobe or finger to measure a person's heart rate or blood flow.  

Features

  • The Vu Heart Rate Sensor is able to distinguish whether the person is suffering from by physical or mental stress through the sensor
  • Attached the sensing clip to a finger or earlobe to measure blood flow or heart rate
  • Able to measure beats per/minute
  • Activities include recovery & pulse rate, heart rate changes due to activity, the effect of foods such as caffeine & chocolate in the system, effect of music on pulse rate
  • Allows for remote logging set up from a PC
  • It is required for the test subject to keep as still as possible whilst having the ensign clip on

Description:
Vu Light Gates are digital switch-type sensors. The sensors can be used to measure time and speed from A-B

  • A single light gate can be used to measure time and speed at A or use both sensors to measure time and speed from A-B
